jokes.setup: What do you get when you mix May Day with a pi√±ata?
jokes.punchline: A spring fling with a swing!

jokes.setup: what's a doodle dog's favorite type of art?
jokes.punchline: Casually penciled paw-traits, of course!

jokes.setup: What's a hackers favrotie season?
jokes.punchline: Phishing Season!

jokes.setup: Why is the password 'incorrect' so popular?
jokes.punchline: Because everytime you forget it, the login says 'your password is incorrect!'

jokes.setup: What do you call a sibling who tells great jokes?
jokes.punchline: Your *pun-derful* brother or sister!

jokes.setup: Why do newborn babies scream so much?
jokes.punchline: Their *womb service* got cut off!

jokes.setup: Why did the tuba player get locked out of the band room?
jokes.punchline: Because they couldn't find the right key!

jokes.setup: What's the difference between a piano and a tuna?
jokes.punchline: You can tune a piano but you can't tun(e-)a fish!

jokes.setup: What's a comic book hero's favorite type of exercise?
jokes.punchline: Super-sets!

jokes.setup: Why don't comic books ever get bored?
jokes.punchline: Because they're always full of action!

jokes.setup: Why did the lemonade go to school?
jokes.punchline: To get a little *squeeze* of knowledge!

jokes.setup: What is a jedi's favorite dessert?
jokes.punchline: Obi-Wan Cannoli!

jokes.setup: Who is Darth Vader's favorite band?
jokes.punchline: Pink Floyd of course. He's all about the Dark Side!

jokes.setup: What do you call a grilled hoagie that tells jokes?
jokes.punchline: A pun-ini!

jokes.setup: What do the Great Lakes do when they're feeling down?
jokes.punchline: They shore each other up!

jokes.for: Hug A Shed and Take A Picture Day
jokes.setup: Why did the shed get a promotion?
jokes.punchline: Because it was good at keeping things together!

jokes.setup: I'm on a sea-food diet.
jokes.punchline: I see food, and then I eat it!

jokes.setup: Why did the nurse bring a red pen to work?
jokes.punchline: In case they needed to draw blood!

jokes.setup: Why did the teacher wear sunglasses?
jokes.punchline: Because their students were so bright!

jokes.setup: Why did the globe refuse to travel?
jokes.punchline: It felt it was already well-rounded!

jokes.for: National Give Someone A Cupcake Day
jokes.setup: What did the cupcake say to the muffin?
jokes.punchline: You bake my day!

jokes.setup: Why did the magnets get in trouble?
jokes.punchline: They were always sticking together!

jokes.setup: Why don't shrimp share their secrets?
jokes.punchline: Because they're a little shellfish!

jokes.setup: Why did the Mother's Day gift arrive the day after Mother's Day?
jokes.punchline: It was choco-LATE!

jokes.for: National Eat What You Want Day
jokes.setup: I'm on a sea-food diet.
jokes.punchline: I see food, and then I eat it!

jokes.setup: What's the difference between an oral thermometer and a rectal thermometer?
jokes.punchline: The taste!

jokes.setup: I just found out the famous actor Miles Teller uses a stage name.
jokes.punchline: Turns out, his original name is Odometer.

jokes.setup: How do you know if someone loves hummus?
jokes.punchline: They'll *spread* the word!

jokes.setup: Why did the crouton break up with the salad?
jokes.punchline: It felt like it was just getting tossed around!

jokes.setup: Why did the buttermilk biscuit get promoted?
jokes.punchline: Because it *rose* to the occasion!

jokes.setup: Why did the chocolate chip go to school?
jokes.punchline: It wanted to be a smart cookie!

jokes.setup: What's a family's favorite type of comedy?
jokes.punchline: *Relative* humor!
